name: Phobia Treatment VR
description:
An application aimed at treating phobias using virtual reality.

Phobias, attached in the app:

  • Acrophobia: fear of heights
  • Claustrophobia: fear of enclosed spaces
  • Trypanophobia is the fear of injections
  • Aerophobia, or the fear of flying
  • Arachnophobia is the fear of spiders and other arachnids.
  • Social Phobia (Social Anxiety Disorder)

In the application, we used assets purchased from an unity assetstore and our own.
